ticket.title: ActionMailer doesn't know the method delivery_handler
ticket.original-body: I'm using ActionMailer when creating an account the user should get an confirmation email. If the account-create-method calls the AccountMailer.deliver_confirmation method to send the email, rails responses : NoMethodError (undefined method `delivery_handler=' for {}:Hash)
